text: Now You're Gone – The Album is the studio album by Swedish musician Basshunter. It was released on July 14, 2008. ==Track listing== == Charts == === Weekly charts === Chart (2008-2009) Peak position European European Albums (Billboard) 6 American Dance/Electronic Albums (Billboard) 14 American Heatseekers Albums (Billboard) 45 === Year-end charts === Chart (2008) Position United Kingdom (Official Charts Company) 45 Chart (2009) Position New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) 14 === Certifications === Region Certification Certified units/sales United Kingdom (BPI) Platinum 376,017 New Zealand (RMNZ) Platinum 20,000+ * sales based on certification alone ^ shipments based on certification alone x unspecified figures based on certification alone ‡ sales+streaming figures based on certification alone ==References== ==Other websites== *Basshunter's official website Category:2008 albums Category:Dance albums Category:Basshunter albums
title: Now You're Gone – The Album
